invalid_request: The authorization request sent to the remote system by the DE was invalid. Please contact support.
unauthorized_client: The DE is not authorized to request access to the remote system. Please contact support.
access_denied: The remote system denied the authorization request. Please try again or contact support.
unsupported_response_type: The remote system does not support the response requested by the DE. Please contact support.
invalid_scope: The remote system does not support the scope requested by the DE. Please contact support.
server_error: The remote system system encountered an error. Please try again or contact support.
temporarily_unavailable: The remote system is temporarily unavailable. Please try again or contact support.
invalid_oauth_config: A DE configuration error was detected. Please contact support.
no_auth_code_provided: Invalid authorization attempt. Please contact support.
no_state_id_provided: Required information was missing from the authorization attempt. Please contact support.
general_service_error: The DE service encountered an error. Please contact support.
processing_request: Linking the DE to the remote system.
